content: the wrapover cardigan is knitted in one piece from the bottom up starting with the back it is worked in garter stitch you knit the back from the bottom up adding on extra stitches for the sleeves part way through the sleeves you cast off stitches for the back neck then you knit each side in turn downwards from the shoulder materials * 78-80 grams dk yarn * 3 small flat buttons ***this is a very small garment 92sts at 22sts per 10cms comes out at a finished chest measurement of 41 8cms or 18 4 be sure to check your gauge and consider adding more stitches *** ***the sleeves come out quite narrow therefore consider adding a few more row to deepen them *** ***you are probably going to need at least 300 metres of yarn judging by metreages other people have used you ll manage with 60-80 grams only if you use acrylic *** available on the internet archive in * german 1 * english *baby cardigan* 2 * french *brassière lilas pour bébé* au point mousse aig n°3 5 pour bébé en taille 3 mois 3 * voir aussi * cache coeur 4 en jersey endroit tailles 3 6-12 mois * 1 https //web archive org/web/20170819034621/http //madamulma blogspot co at/2016/06/wickeljackchen-fur-kleine-erdengaste html 2 https //web archive org/web/20170809141142/http //madamulma blogspot co uk/p/baby-cardigan html 3 http //mes-tricots-et-astuces over-blog com/article-brassiere-lilas-pour-bebe-117650930 html 4 http //mes-tricots-et-astuces over-blog com/article-cache-coeur-102683463 html
